item.title: Youtube Links
item.description: Here’s a list of content creators that I like to watch and are worth mentioning: Electronics I enjoy watching people that talk about electronics, dissect hardware or repair ancient devices: Andreas Spiess – #HomeAssistant, #IoT, #Radio Asbesto Molesto – #Radio, #Repairs (Italian) Big Clive – #Relaxing, #ReverseEngineering Mr Carlson’s Lab – #Radio Gaming These are some people that play videogames: Keith Ballard Cohh Carnage – a good man that streams every day The Gaming Closet – a friend’s channel (Italian) Food Mimmo Corcione (Italian)
